thread.section_title: Ruby Lane Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Ruby Lane | www.rubylane.com
thread.title: Susan Allison
thread.title_full: Ruby Lane reviewed by Susan Allison

author: Susan Allison
title: Susan Allison
text: The service of the sellers I have utilized has been 100 percent positive. I have primarily been looking at the vintage/antique jewelry. I would appreciate a standard frame of reference, however, like always placing the item next to a quarter (and not any other size of coin) or all rings displayed on a finger (with the ring size of that finger disclosed). This would eliminate most secondary inquiries and help with the process of shopping! Thank you!
